availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Smedley (Paducah, McCracken County, Kentucky, judge)

body.p: Paducah, McCracken County, Kentucky, judge. Kentucky native. Married to Christina Smedley, Father of Elizabeth Lewis Smedley and George Smedley. Police Judge in McCracken County, Kentucky, in 1850. Police Judge in McCracken County in 1859. City Judge in Paducah in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Division No. 1 (Paducah and Suburbs), p. 140A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, District No. 2 Paducah, p. 907.
KYR-0001-028-0021.
